DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate non-inferiority immune response new versus currently recommend intradermal regimen rabies vaccine administer without rabies immunoglobulins healthy subject ≥ 1 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Two Intradermal Rabies Vaccine Regimens Administered With Without Human Rabies Immunoglobulin Subjects ≥ 1 Years Age
